attributes.action: Action to be taken in the paedophile ring of the people in power of Britain.
attributes.background: For years and years our government and other established people of power have been taking part in a pedophile ring. It is constantly covered up and enough is enough!  1000 children dissappear every month in Britain alone eating by these disgusting sex ring's

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104539


You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
